alert.note: Alert for Dunn; McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 7:09PM CDT until August 01 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dunn County in southwestern North Dakota... Southeastern McKenzie County in northwestern North Dakota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southeast of Theodore Roosevelt National Park North Unit, or 23 miles southeast of Watford City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Killdeer around 630 PM MDT. Dunn Center around 640 PM MDT. Halliday around 655 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Oakdale, Twin Buttes, Little Missouri State Park and Fort Berthold. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
